metadata.title: DND 642 Magenta Aura Gel & Matching Polish Set - DND Gel & Lacquer
metadata.details: {"Brand": "Daisy DND", "Item Form": "Gel", "Type": "Gel", "Material Feature": "Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free", "Age Range (Description)": "Adult", "Unit Count": "1 fl oz", "Number of Items": "2", "Liquid Volume": "0.5 Fluid Ounces", "UPC": "686797905706"}

categorization.explanation: The product is a set of gel and matching polish, which is typically used for nail art and care. Therefore, it fits best under the 'Nail Art & Polish' subcategory of 'Foot, Hand & Nail Care' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
